org.nd4j.linalg.memory.abstracts

Class Nd4jWorkspace

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.memory.abstracts.Nd4jWorkspace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, MemoryWorkspace
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CpuWorkspace, CudaWorkspace

    public abstract class Nd4jWorkspace
extends java.lang.Object
implements MemoryWorkspace
    Basic implementation for MemoryWorkspace interface, further extended in corresponding backends

      • getCurrentSize

        public long getCurrentSize()
        This method returns current amount of memory allocated for workspace. PLEASE NOTE: It shows only amount of HOST memory. If current backend assumes DEVICE/HOST memory pair, DEVICE memory will probably have the same size, but won't be accounted in this value.
        Specified by:
        getCurrentSize in interface MemoryWorkspace
